description: It turns out that houseboy Matt Skyler is more than an innocent peeping tom. He enters the room of Doug Jeffries and is caught red handed trying to steal something out of a drawer. Matt pleads with Doug...he'll do anything so long as Doug doesn't turn him in.   Doug is quick to take advantage of the situation...making Matt suck his cock before turning Matt over for some heavy assplay and fisting...followed by a stiff hard fuck.
title: Steal The Night, Scene #03
